name: SSL Implementation Checking (HttpHost)
description: This app uses "HttpHost", but the default scheme is `"HTTP"` or `"HttpHost.DEFAULT_SCHEME_NAME (HTTP)"`. Accessing URLs in plain HTTP is a security hazard since a malicious user could intercept and/or modify the exchanged data.
remediation: Please change Default Scheme Name to `"HTTPS"`.

references.text: Further information on HttpHost can be found in the official documentation [[1]].
